revision.text:
{{Infobox Berry |name = #24 Hondew |image = [[File:Hondew.png]] |caption = This somewhat-rare Berry projects an image of luxury, so it is favored as a gift item. |growtime = 3h 0m 0s |harvest = 23 berries |replant = 20% |points = 2,000 |flavor =
*10 spicy *10 dry *0 sweet *10 bitter *0 sour }} === Description === '''Hondew''' is a type of [[Berries|Berry]] that can be planted in [[Farm]]. It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with exactly 15 points of spicy, dry and bitter and 0 points of all other flavours. The [[Figy]], [[Wiki]] and [[Aguav]] must be unlocked to unlock this berry. === Growth Tables === ==== Growth Stages ==== {| class="wikitable" |+ Growth Stages ! !! Sprout !! Taller !! Bloom !! Berry |- ! Time passed since planting | 16 mins 40 secs || 33 mins 20 secs || 1 hour 23 mins 20 secs || 3 hours - 6 hours |- ! Animation |
[[File:AllTreeSprout.png|50px]] ||
[[File:HondewTreeTaller.png|50px]] ||
[[File:HondewTreeBloom.png|50px]] ||
[[File:HondewTreeBerry.png|50px]] |} ==== Ripening Time with Modifiers ==== {| class="wikitable collapsible" | style="text-align: center;" ! Modifier !! Ripe-Wither Time !! Boost Mulch Needed to Ripen |- ! None | 3 hours -
6 hours || --- |- ! Mulch/Sprayduck | 2 hours -
4 hours || 24 mulch |- ! Mulch*Sprayduck | 1 hour 20 mins -
2 hours 40 mins || 16 mulch |} === Mutation Strategy === ==== Possible Planting Formations ==== You can fill your [[farm]] in following way to obtain Hondew berry. {| class="wikitable" style="text-align: center;" |+ Farm |- | style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Figy.png|30px]]
[[Figy]] || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | || style="width: 40px;" | [[File:Figy.png|30px]]
[[Figy]] |- | [[File:Wiki.png|30px]]
[[Wiki]] || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] || || [[File:Wiki.png|30px]]
[[Wiki]] || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] |- style="height: 50px;" | || || || || |- | || [[File:Figy.png|30px]]
[[Figy]] || || || [[File:Figy.png|30px]]
[[Figy]] |- | [[File:Wiki.png|30px]]
[[Wiki]] || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] || || [[File:Wiki.png|30px]]
[[Wiki]] || [[File:Aguav.png|30px]] [[Aguav]] |} ==== Timing Table ==== {| class="collapsible wikitable"| style="text-align: center;" |+ ''All planting times use the time-to-ripe remaining of the first planted berry for subsequent planting times'' ! Berry !! Planting Time with
No Modifier !! Planting Time with
Mulch/Sprayduck || Planting Time with
Mulch*Sprayduck |- | [[Wiki]] || - || - || - |- | [[Figy]] || 6 mins until ripe || 4 mins until ripe || Not Practical |- | [[Aguav]] || 6 mins until ripe || 4 mins until ripe || Not Practical |} {{Berries}}

{{Infobox Berry |name = #24 Hondew |image = [[File:Hondew.png]] |caption = This somewhat-rare Berry projects an image of luxury, so it is favored as a gift item. |growtime = 3h 0m 0s |harvest = 23 berries |replant = 20% |points = 2,000 |flavor =

It can be obtained by surrounding an empty plot with exactly 15 points of spicy, dry and bitter and 0 points of all other flavours.
